function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Severe disruptions and delays in construction projects due to workforce unable to work as a result of stringent self-quarantine guidelines.","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low rate of building renovations that reduce carbon emissions","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for interactions between populations in nearby localities and mobility networks","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in data collection and availability","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited update of confirmed cases by region on the public health website of france until 25 march","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused urban standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of local travel ban accompanying home isolation policies","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unbalanced panels in the data due to different start dates for testing for covid-19 in localities","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited sample of data for estimating policy impact","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused urban standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited quantity of data available","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused building standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate follow-up period after coating application","category":"Inadequate hospital design","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited evaluation criteria for non-physical architectural themes","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap and repetition of biophilic design elements","category":"Improper architectural designs","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and air quality control","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited dining options at the local university due to construction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in catchment area sizes and wastewater flow","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of chemical reagents and solvents","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different building codes and systems of sustainability assessments in different countries may lead to inconsistencies and lack of standardization in pandemic-sustainable criteria for residential buildings.","category":"Lack of emphasis on water quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of a complete system to measure building readiness responding to pandemics may result in incomplete or ineffective preparedness for future pandemics.","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The focus on perturbations with major social, political, economic, and/or ecological impacts may include contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment.","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in smes can lead to the rapid spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to untangle the complexities of multi-factorial pathways through which planning impacts urban health","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rear extensions do not allow for a ready installation of a containment space without sacrificing room functionality or garden space.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of a front room into a containment space places the containment space in the heart of the sleeping quarters.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recent homes with double garages at the front may require the owner to forgo a car parking space in order to insert a containment room module.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shared access points and common bottlenecks in apartment buildings make them vulnerable to becoming hotspots for contagious diseases, leading to rapid transmission among residents.","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in the built environment leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and natural light due to building envelope design","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate spacing and allocation for car parking","category":"Poor urban planning","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient thermal performance of building envelope","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on smart solutions for hotspot identification may lead to neglect of other critical factors contributing to disease spread.","category":"Inadequate adaptability to emerging problems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sensors without proper calibration could lead to inaccurate measurements of iaq parameters.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low-cost iaq monitor may have limited accuracy and reliability, leading to incorrect measurements of pollutants.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or delayed estimation of atmospheric changes and pollutants in indoor environments.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of low-cost micro gas sensors and arduino microcontroller may result in inaccurate iaq monitoring and data quality issues.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless communication using zigbee module may introduce interference and communication disruptions in iaq monitoring system.","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate air quality prediction leading to inadequate control measures","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate monitoring of iaq parameters","category":"Lack of emphasis on air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in supply chains","category":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges for public transport systems","category":"Lack of emphasis on urban standards","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly designed and resourced housing exacerbating the spread of the virus","category":"Inadequate mobility schemes","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need to re-imagine water systems and infrastructure to address climate change and potential outbreaks","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of confidence in water services","category":"Lack of emphasis on water quality ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased personnel density in centralised infrastructure management","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in centralised infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of onsite electricity generation and storage units","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Plug-and-play installation may lead to overlooking safety and environmental factors.","category":"Infrastructure maintenance risk ","confidence":"Medium"}]}
